title: Benchmarks, Ablations, Reporting: A Practical Howâ€‘To
summary: Set up benchmarks, run ablations, and export a complete evidence bundle.
bodyMd:
## Steps
1. Define task and dataset snapshot
2. Select models and ablations
3. Run and compare deltas
4. Export signed evidence bundle

## Outputs
Utility, privacy, ablation tables, lineage, and signatures.
